content: The Gore-Eye Daoist is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss in the Yellow Wind Formation through one of three possible entrances to where the Chapter Boss resides behind sealed stone gates.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
The Gore-Eye Daoist is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss in the Yellow Wind Formation through one of three possible entrances to where the Chapter Boss resides behind sealed stone gates.
